title: Dashboard Real-Time Data Accuracy
description: Verify that the dashboard displays accurate and real-time sales summary, order counts, inventory alerts, staff attendance, and sales trend charts with no stale data.

steps.description: Log in as Manager.
Navigate to the Dashboard page.
Verify sales summary and order counts match current system data.
Check low stock alerts correspond to inventory levels below thresholds.
Confirm staff attendance statuses reflect actual clock-in/out data.
Validate sales trend charts display recent data updates within acceptable delay.

title: POS Order Processing with Valid Inputs
description: Ensure POS processes orders correctly with valid menu selections, modifier choices, discount application within 0-20%, phone number validation for Brunei format, and generates accurate receipt and updates order queue.

steps.description: Log in as POS Operator.
Open POS page and select menu items with required and optional modifiers.
Apply discount within allowed range (e.g., 15%).
Enter a valid +673 phone number.
Select order type (takeaway or GoMamam).
Submit the order.
Verify receipt is generated accurately including discount details.
Confirm order queue reflects the new order with correct status.

title: POS Order Processing with Invalid Inputs
description: Validate POS rejects orders with invalid modifier selections, discounts greater than 20%, and invalid phone number formats.

steps.description: Log in as POS Operator.
Select menu items but omit required modifier selection.
Attempt to apply discount of 25%.
Enter an invalid phone number format.
Attempt to submit the order.
Verify validation messages appear for missing modifiers.
Verify validation message for discount exceeding max limit.
Verify phone number validation error is displayed.
Confirm order is not processed.

title: Menu Management CRUD Operations
description: Validate ability to create, read, update, and delete menu items, categories, and modifier groups with proper validation and enforcement of required and optional modifier options.

steps.description: Log in as Manager.
Navigate to Menu Management page.
Create new menu category.
Add new menu item with associated category and modifier groups.
Update an existing modifier group to change required/optional status.
Toggle availability status of a menu item.
Delete an existing menu item.
Confirm all CRUD operations persist changes correctly and UI reflects updates.

title: Kitchen Display System Order Status Flow
description: Verify orders flow correctly through statuses (pending → preparing → ready → completed) with timers and produce audio notifications at correct stages.

steps.description: Log in as Kitchen staff.
Access Kitchen Display System page.
Receive a new order and observe it appears in pending status.
Update order status sequentially to preparing, ready, and completed.
Verify order timers start and update correctly per status.
Confirm audio notifications play at preparing and ready transitions.

title: Inventory Stock Adjustments and Alerts
description: Test stock adjustments with logging of reasons, enforce minimum stock alerts trigger correctly, and verify association with suppliers.

steps.description: Login as Inventory Manager.
Navigate to Inventory Management page.
Perform stock adjustment for a stock item with a logged reason.
Validate stock level updates correctly.
Confirm adjustment reason is recorded in logs.
Adjust stock to below minimum threshold.
Verify minimum stock alert is triggered in the system.
Associate a stock item with supplier profile.
Confirm supplier details linked correctly to the stock item.

title: HR Attendance Clock-In/Out with PIN and Photo Verification
description: Ensure staff can clock in and out with valid PIN and photo verification enforcing correct authentication and logging.

steps.description: Log in as staff.
Navigate to HR timeclock page.
Enter valid PIN.
Capture photo for verification.
Submit clock-in request.
Validate clock-in is successful and timestamp is logged.
Repeat clock-out process.
Confirm attendance status updates accurately.

title: HR KPI Scoring and Leaderboard Accuracy
description: Test KPI scoring calculations and leaderboard rankings for staff display correct relative performance tiers (S/A/B/C/D).

steps.description: Log in as HR Manager.
Navigate to KPI scoring page.
Input/update KPI performance metrics for multiple staff.
Generate and view KPI leaderboard.
Verify ranks and tier scores correctly reflect the input data.

title: Payroll Generation with Brunei Statutory Deductions
description: Confirm payroll reports apply TAP and SCP statutory deductions accurately according to Brunei regulations and generate correct payable amounts.

steps.description: Log in as HR Manager.
Navigate to Payroll page.
Generate payroll for current period.
Validate TAP and SCP deductions are applied correctly for all eligible staff.
Confirm final payroll amounts match expected calculations.

title: Employee Self-Service Portal Functionalities
description: Verify staff can view schedules, submit leave requests, apply for claim reimbursements, complete checklists with photo proofs, view payslips, and update profiles successfully.

steps.description: Log in as Staff.
Access Staff Portal page.
View personal work schedule.
Submit a leave request.
Confirm leave request is captured and reflected in leave balance.
Submit an expense claim.
Validate claim submission is accepted with correct details.
Complete a checklist item with photo proof upload.
Confirm checklist item status updates and photo proof is saved.
View latest payslip.
Verify payslip data matches payroll report.
Update profile information and save.
Confirm profile updates persist successfully.

title: Delivery Hub Order Aggregation and Kanban Operations
description: Verify delivery orders from Grab, FoodPanda, and Shopee aggregate correctly on the kanban board; status changes reflect in UI with audio notifications and delivery slip printing works.

steps.description: Log in as Delivery staff.
Open Delivery Hub page.
Verify orders from supported platforms appear correctly in their respective columns.
Update order statuses across kanban board columns.
Confirm UI updates accordingly and audio notifications trigger on new orders.
Print delivery slip for an order.
Validate delivery slip is formatted and generated correctly.

title: Finance Module Expense Tracking and Reports
description: Test expense entry with categories, daily cash flow management including opening and closing balances, and profit & loss report generation for accuracy.

steps.description: Log in as Finance staff.
Navigate to Finance page.
Add expenses with valid categories (rent, wages, supplies, etc.).
Verify expenses save with correct categorization.
Record daily cash flow with correct opening and closing balances.
Validate cash flow balances reconcile with transactions.
Generate profit & loss report.
Confirm report data matches underlying expense records.

title: Customer CRM Loyalty Points and Segmentation
description: Verify customer loyalty points tracking, segmentation into new, regular, and VIP customers, and correct order history and birthday tracking.

steps.description: Log in as Marketing team member.
Navigate to Customer CRM page.
Add orders to customer profiles to accumulate loyalty points.
Verify loyalty points update correctly.
Validate customers are segmented accurately based on points and order frequency.
Confirm birthday tracking highlights customers with upcoming birthdays.

title: Promotion Codes with Restrictions and Discount Applications
description: Ensure promotion codes enforce time validity, usage limits, applicable item restrictions, and apply discounts properly across supported discount types.

steps.description: Log in as Marketing team member.
Create promotion codes with various discount types: percentage, fixed amount, BOGO, free item.
Set date ranges, usage limits, and day/time restrictions for codes.
Verify promo codes are accepted only within valid date/time ranges and usage limits.
Check discount application is correct on applicable items including enforcement of restrictions.
Attempt to use promo codes outside allowed conditions.
Validate appropriate rejection or error messages are displayed.

title: PWA Offline Support and Service Worker Functionality
description: Test PWA capabilities including offline caching of pages/data, correct service worker registration, and install prompt triggering.

steps.description: Load the app in a supported browser.
Confirm service worker registers successfully.
Use the app normally to cache data locally.
Simulate offline conditions.
Verify app functionality persists and cached data renders correctly while offline.
Trigger install prompt and accept installation.
Confirm app installs as a PWA on device.

title: Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
description: Validate PIN-based authentication for clock in/out and that role-based UI access restricts views correctly between Manager and Staff roles.

steps.description: Attempt login with valid PIN as Manager.
Confirm successful login and access to Manager modules.
Attempt login with valid PIN as Staff.
Confirm successful login and UI restricts access to permitted staff features.
Attempt login with invalid PIN.
Verify login failure and error notification.
Check session management terminates inactive sessions appropriately.
Confirm access is revoked after logout or session expiry.

title: WhatsApp Messaging Integration for Notifications
description: Test that WhatsApp messages for order receipts, order ready alerts, low stock warnings, and daily summaries are sent with correct content and formatting.

steps.description: Trigger sending of order receipt via WhatsApp.
Validate receipt message format matches requirements.
Trigger order ready notification.
Confirm WhatsApp notification is received with correct details.
Trigger low stock alert messaging.
Validate alert message content and recipient correctness.
Trigger sending of daily summary messages.
Confirm summary is sent with accurate business metrics.

title: Export Services Generate Accurate Reports
description: Validate exporting orders, inventory, attendance, and expense data into PDF, Excel, and CSV formats producing accurate, complete, and correctly formatted files.

steps.description: Navigate to export functionality for Orders.
Generate and download PDF, Excel, and CSV reports.
Verify content completeness and data accuracy in exported files.
Repeat exports for Inventory, Attendance, and Expenses.
Confirm all exports produce consistent and correct output.

title: Internationalization Toggle Functionality
description: Check that toggling between English and Bahasa Melayu changes all user interface text consistently and no untranslated text remains.

steps.description: Log in to the system.
Navigate to Settings page.
Change interface language from English to Bahasa Melayu.
Verify all UI text, menus, labels, and notifications are in Bahasa Melayu without missing translations.
Switch back to English.
Confirm UI updates correctly to English with no language inconsistencies.

title: Theme Management Dark/Light Mode Toggling and Persistence
description: Test toggling between dark and light themes updates UI immediately and the user's theme preference persists across sessions.

steps.description: Log in to the system.
Toggle theme setting from light to dark mode.
Verify UI theme updates instantly to dark mode.
Log out and log in again.
Confirm previously selected dark mode theme is persisted.
